detectors.description: AlphaCrowdsale._deliverTokens(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AlphaCrowdsale.sol#169-171) ignores return value by _token.transfer(beneficiary,tokenAmount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AlphaCrowdsale.sol#170)

AlphaCrowdsale.withdrawTokens(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AlphaCrowdsale.sol#208-210) ignores return value by _token.transfer(_wallet,_amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AlphaCrowdsale.sol#209)

	- AlphaCrowdsale.wallet() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AlphaCrowdsale.sol#129-131) (function)

	- AlphaCrowdsale.token() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AlphaCrowdsale.sol#125-127) (function)

Reentrancy in AlphaCrowdsale.buyTokens(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AlphaCrowdsale.sol#141-162):
